A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Biggest disappointment of all time. They never understood that it's part of a saga and they changed everything! Luke isnt Luke\, Leia isnt Leia\, Yoda isnt Yoda...the Movie isnt a Star wars movie!! So stupid! leia flying like Mary Poppins? Coward Luke defeated by Rey? Snoke defeated easily by Kylo?
